title: Mrr
body: Where can i find out my mmr?

replies.body: The best way to determine your MMR is by your current placement in ranked.  There is no specific numerical mmr that is available.  More information on mmr and how matchmaking based on MMR works can be found in our [matchmaking ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752954-Matchmaking-Guide)guide.  I hope that helps clear things up, and best of luck in your games!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Ztz5HIhr,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-08-25T22:39:12.284+0000)
>
> The best way to determine your MMR is by your current placement in ranked.  There is no specific numerical mmr that is available.  More information on mmr and how matchmaking based on MMR works can be found in our [matchmaking ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752954-Matchmaking-Guide)guide.  I hope that helps clear things up, and best of luck in your games!

Thanks
